name: Slime's Adventure (Klwnn)
description:
Info

so a slime decides to go through hell. wanna guess who the slime is?

This game is a near impossible, rage inducing platformer, on a gameboy. 

now i know what you are thinking. "why are you doing this?" well the answer is simple. because im a sadist  i like platformers. yeah you heard that right. i actually like platformers. but anyways. its a quick and 'fun' game for anyone who feels like playing something. 

Controls 

the controls are:

A : Z

B : X 

Start : enter 

Select : Shift

--- 

do remember to have fun!
